name: dashboard-seed
description: Autonomous dashboard composer — discovers data model and user roles, selects widgets, installs layout + components, and wires navigation. Delivers a working dashboard shell with the right widgets for your domain.
postMessage:
Dashboard Seed installed at .claude/skills/dashboard-seed/SKILL.md

Describe your application and what data needs to be visible. The skill composes a complete dashboard from 18 available components:

Layout: shell, sidebar-nav, user-menu
Data: kpi-cards, charts, data-table, heatmap
Workflow: kanban, calendar, gantt-chart, resource-scheduler
Comms: notification-center, activity-feed, search-global
Config: settings-page, realtime-websocket, map-visualization

Not a list — a wired dashboard. The skill generates navigation config and layout composition.
